entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
